generatedTitle: Inaugural Hollywood Walk of Fame and First Star Placement

extractFactDictList.question: When was the Hollywood Walk of Fame established?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Hollywood Walk of Fame was established on February 8, The first star to be laid in the new Walk was that of Stanley Kramer on March 28, 1960, near the intersection of Hollywood and Gower.

extractFactDictList.question: Who was the first star to be laid in the new Walk?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The first star to be laid in the new Walk was that of Stanley Kramer on March 28, 1960, near the intersection of Hollywood and Gower.
